name: mm-dialog
description: A wrapper around mm-modal used to quickly create dialog boxes

attributes.name: type
attributes.description: The type of message this is, which determines the icon/icon color

attributes.name: header
attributes.description: Text to display in the header of dialog window

attributes.name: width
attributes.description: The pixel width of the dialog window

attributes.name: noscroll
attributes.description: Disable page scrolling while the dialog is open

attributes.name: dismiss
attributes.description: Whether or not the dialog can be dismissed by the user without a response

properties.name: hidden
properties.description: The visible state of the dialog window and blocker.

properties.name: width
properties.description: The pixel width of the dialog window.

properties.name: dismiss
properties.description: Whether or not the dialog can be dismissed by the user without a response.

properties.name: actions
properties.description: An array of actions/buttons to show in the footer, of the form {label: String, type: String, handleClick: Function}. type should be either "primary" or "secondary". handleClick may take optional arguments for the event object and the mm-dialog node.
